summary.value: Justice is not something you ask for. It's something you make.

system.description:
UNCHAINED

ALSO: Avenger, Rebel, Renegade

When those in power refuse to listen to reason, revolt becomes inevitable. But at what price?

The Unchained are people who have decided to use every weapon at their disposal to rebel against a world they deem unjust, to break their chains, and to strike back against the tyrants they fight.

UNCHAINED FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your Inventory Points by 2.

UNCHAINED SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.OIt43boltyTXI0Jn]{Friendships and Enmities}

The first time you arrive in a community (or some time before) you can confess to your companions that you've been there before, and tell them how you stood up to the local authorities. Describe an NPC who should still be indebted to you for this.

The GM then chooses and expresses one additional difficulty that exists because of this: an influential local person has declared that they will take revenge on you, local people don't want to be seen or associated with you, your head is being actively searched for with a bounty at stake, one of your former contacts has been captured and may divulge things about you, and so on.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.iOhl9vl5nZcGuMc7]{Sabotage Champion} (SL3)

You get a 【SL】 bonus to your Study or Hinder rolls and to any rolls made to sabotage machines, open locks, arm or disarm traps, or to search for loopholes in any security system.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.ahb9YXvPFxbSxiZL]{Guerilla} (SL5)

After successfully using Study on them, you inflict 【SL × 2】 additional damage and ignore resistances on enemies you attack if they represent or follow an authority figure.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.7UyJmOdJ7kOIUP1F]{Observer} (SL3)

As a action, you can analyze an NPC's behavior and spend up to 【SL × 10】 MP to ask the GM one question for every 10 MP spent, among :

  • What are they paying attention to at the moment?

  • What is their current state of mind?

  • What would it take to attract or divert their attention?

  • What is odd about their immediate behavior?

  • What would it take to get in this person's good graces in this situation?

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.5TvwkeevywBR9GZB]{Reputation Among Rebels} (SL2)

When you request a place to sleep or transportation from a rebel group, you reduce the price of this service by 【SL × 10】z per night of rest or day of travel for each person in your group. This can make the service free, but does not reduce the price below 0 z.

In addition, the first time you ask for help from a rebel group that isn't hostile to you, you can get 【SL× 4】 IP to divide among the group, or a locally unsellable item worth no more than 【SL × 300】 z from them.
